channel.title: Error Loading Client When friend trys to load
channel.description:
Hello Again ! yesterday i tried to change my source and i had everything setup so i uploaded the new client so my friend could beta test for me ... When he ran the client he got this ERROR : [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/nzkqz6.png[/img]
If anyone can help me fix that i would GREATLY Appreciate it , Thank you (:
